m_szDocSumamry: Nuclear exit unthinkable for climate conference host France The cooling tower of the nuclear power plant is pictured near the northern Swiss town Leibstadt May 1, 2014. Reuters/Denis Balibouse (SWITZERLAND - Tags: ENERGY) PARIS Early this year, France's state energy and environment agency was set to publish a study that found the country could realistically abandon nuclear reactors and rely completely on renewable power in decades to come.
